string-array.name: manual_body
string-array.item: Touch a cell to modify its content.
Simply touch a number to add/remove the particular value as candidate.
Touch and hold a number to set your solution.
Touch a number twice to change candidates in multiple cells.
The marked button removes all present candidates and adds the missing ones.
The marked button removes all candidates.
Use the zoom gesture to enlarge or shrink the sudoku.
